title: Help
content:
IIST ECE(Avionics)VS PES ECE

I might get Iist ece(not 100%), I am genuinely confused on what to do now 
Whether pes or IIST 

I have no specific intrest in any brach as such as my main priority is placement(lots of money to be precise)

I got 32xx in pessat, I could not attent 1st round counselling?

I am not sure if I'll get IIST but as a precaution I am asking 

Thanks in advance

comments.body:
Go to iist man  
no discussion
Placement better in PES. IIST Placement highlights only ISRO if you maintain 75% or more
I can't believe this is a question. Smh

Bro I really don't know anything about colleges or engineering, I am only doing this for money 

I don't have any intrest as such
how are you getting IIST? Doesn't it require very high jee adv rank?
Check if iist has an option to take cse for minors, if yes then go for it, else pes;
